abstract: Carl-Henric Svanberg, who is known for repairing Ericsson’s business by aggressively cutting costs and repaying debt, is set to succeed Peter Sutherland next year.
snippet: Carl-Henric Svanberg, who is known for repairing Ericsson’s business by aggressively cutting costs and repaying debt, is set to succeed Peter Sutherland next year.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  The British oil company BP named the chief executive of the Swedish telecommunication company Ericsson as its chairman on Thursday to help the company control costs.

headline.main: BP Taps the Telecommunications Industry for Its Chairman
headline.print_headline: BP Taps the Telecommunications Industry for Its Chairman
